menu.memberSelection.name: Name
basicScreen.fortKearney: Welcome to Fort Kearney! You have come a long way, make sure to stock up before you leave.
basicScreen.confluencePoint: You can see where the North and South Platte River meet far across the plains.
basicScreen.southPlatteRiver: As you near the South Platte River you start to realize how difficult it will be to cross.
basicScreen.ashHollowComplex: The descent to Ash Hollow may be difficult but your trail guide promises fresh water, firewood, and a safe campsite for the night.
basicScreen.courthouseRock: Far in the distance you see large structures stretch high above the horizon. They vaguely remind you of home...
basicScreen.chimneyRock: As the miles pass, a lonely spire takes shape. You know you are on the right path.
basicScreen.scottsBluff: As you pass below the sheer cliffside, you make out a memorial to one Hiram Scott.
basicScreen.fortLaramie: Welcome to Fort Laramie. After the hardships of the trail, you and your party decide to take a much deserved rest before continuing on.
basicScreen.lakotaProvoked: You provoked a group of Lakota Sioux and they retaliated.
basicScreen.bear: A member of your party was mauled to death by a bear.
basicScreen.starve: You have run out of food and began to starve.
basicScreen.injury: A member of your party has broken their leg.
basicScreen.mercury: A member of you party has ingested mercury and has been inflicted with mercury poisoning.
basicScreen.wagon: A member of your party has been run over by a wagon.
basicScreen.stampede: Your party has encountered a bison stampede.
basicScreen.snake: A member of your party has been bitten by a snake!!!
basicScreen.burglary: You have been robbed by bandits.
basicScreen.cholera: A member of your party has been infected with cholera.
basicScreen.measles: A member of your party has been infected with measles.
basicScreen.alkali: A member of your party has been infected with Alkali Sickness.
basicScreen.dysentery: A member of your party has been infected with dysentery.
basicScreen.scurvy: A member of your party has been infected with scurvy.
basicScreen.pregnant: A member of your party has become pregnant.
basicScreen.flood: Your wagon has been flooded from excessive rain.
basicScreen.hypothermia: A member of your party has been infected with hypothermia.
tradingScreen.nativeAmerican: You have encountered a group of Pawnee who would like to trade.
tradingScreen.pioneer: You have encountered another wagon of settlers who would like to trade.
tradingScreen.trade: The trader has offered one %s. What would you like to trade for it?
tradingScreen.playerChoice: Choose a party member to trade with:
tradingScreen.success: You have successfully traded for one %s.
tradingScreen.pluralFail: Your proposed trade was not accepted. You have two tries left.
tradingScreen.singularFail: Your proposed trade was not accepted. You have one try left.
tradingScreen.finalFail: The trader got fed up with trying to trade with you and stole %s items.
game.loss: All of your members have died. You did not make it Westward.
game.victory:
You have reached the end of the trail. Congratulations on completing the game!
Score: %s
intro.description:
Welcome to Westward!
Your group has travelled a long way on the %s. It is now %s. You have %s dollars remaining. Choose your next actions wisely.
riverCrossing.success:
You successfully made it across the river!
You saved 15 miles.
riverCrossing.fail:
You got swept up the river!
You lost 15 miles.
riverCrossing.controls:
Use the Arrow Keys to move.
Press an Arrow Key to begin
notification.deathFromIllness: %s had %s for too long and died.
notification.wagonFixed: You had the materials to fix the wagon.
notification.wagonBroke: You don't have the parts to fix the wagon. Your group will starve to death.
sleep.title: You Are Resting
sleep.heal.noHealers:
No healers present in your party.
You may not heal members
sleep.heal.good:
The medicine was effective!
%s gained %s health
sleep.heal.bad:
The medicine was ineffective.
%s lost %s health
sleep.heal.statusGood:
The medicine was effective!
%s's %s was reduced
sleep.heal.statusBad:
The medicine was ineffective.
%s's %s was increased
travelScreen.travel: The party has travelled %s miles today
